scripts.generate:unix: npm run antlr:unix && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.generate:win: npm run antlr:win && npm run build && node dist\index.js
scripts.generate: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? process.exit(0) : process.exit(1)" && npm run generate:win || npm run generate:unix
scripts.test: echo "Error: the tests are specified on the root project " && exit 1
